snippet: Weeks after several athletes were accused in a large-scale cheating scandal, Harvard won its season opener by defeating San Diego, 28-13.
abstract: Harvard defeats San Diego, 28-13, in college football.
lead_paragraph: Weeks after several athletes were accused in a large-scale cheating scandal, Harvard won its season opener by defeating San Diego, 28-13.

headline.seo: Harvard Football Team Wins Opener, but Cheating Scandal Spoils Mood
headline.main: Harvard Wins Opener, but Scandal Spoils Mood
headline.print_headline: Harvard Wins Opener, But Scandal Spoils Mood
